words.source: H1696 dabar, Piel weqatal 3ms; KJV 'And he shall … speak', ESV 'He shall speak', NASB 'He shall speak'
Preposition le + 2ms suffix; KJV 'be … to thee', ESV 'for you', NASB 'for you'
H5971 ʿam, noun ms + article he; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the people'
H1961 hayah, Qal weqatal 3ms; KJV 'and he shall be', ESV 'He shall be', NASB 'he will be'
H1961 hayah, Qal yiqtol 3ms; KJV 'shall be', ESV 'shall be', NASB 'will be'
Preposition le + 2ms suffix; KJV 'to thee', ESV/NASB 'to you'
H6310 peh, noun ms + preposition le; KJV 'instead of a mouth', ESV 'as a mouth', NASB 'as a mouth' — DIVERGENT: KJV 'instead of a mouth' vs ESV/NASB 'as a mouth'
H859 ʾattah, independent pronoun 2ms + waw conjunction; KJV 'and thou', ESV 'and you', NASB 'and you'
H1961 hayah, Qal yiqtol 2ms; KJV 'shalt be', ESV 'shall be', NASB 'will be'
Preposition le + 3ms suffix; KJV 'to him', ESV 'to him', NASB 'to him'

H430 ʾelohim, noun mp + preposition le; KJV 'instead of God', ESV 'as God', NASB 'as God' — DIVERGENT: KJV 'instead of God' vs ESV/NASB 'as God'; the sense is that Moses will represent God's authority to Aaron
